books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: There’s an obvious attraction between two newcomers to Thunder Point, Ore., but their differences may run too deep.
books.name: THE CHANCE

books.author: by Janet Evanovich and Lee Goldberg
books.description: Nicolas Fox (a handsome con man) and Kate O’Hare (an F.B.I. agent) team up to steal back a Chinese artifact taken from the Smithsonian.
books.name: THE CHASE

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: The tender story of two people daring to be more than "just friends"; first published in 1986.
books.name: FRIENDS — AND THEN SOME

books.author: by Kim Harrison
books.description: The witch Rachel Morgan must prevent all-out supernatural war; the 12th book in the Hollows series.
books.name: THE UNDEAD POOL

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: Jack Morgan and Justine Smith search for a high-powered celebrity couple who have disappeared.
books.name: PRIVATE L.A.

books.author: by Abbi Glines
books.description: A woman’s half sister despises her, but the half sister’s hunky fling feels different emotions; a Rosemary Beach novel.
books.name: TAKE A CHANCE

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas is on the case when the demolition of a building that once sheltered troubled teenagers reveals skeletons hidden in the walls; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: CONCEALED IN DEATH

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Sue Monk Kidd
books.description: The relationship between a wealthy Charleston girl, Sarah Grimké, who will grow up to become a prominent abolitionist, and the slave she is given for her 11th birthday.
books.name: THE INVENTION OF WINGS

books.author: by H. M. Ward
books.description: The Ferro Family erotic series continues.
books.name: THE ARRANGEMENT 14

books.author: by Jonathan Kellerman
books.description: The psychologist and police consultant Alex Delaware becomes embroiled in a child custody dispute that escalates into murder.
books.name: KILLER

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Joanne Fluke
books.description: The Minnesota baker Hannah Swensen accidentally hits a stranger with her cookie truck. Recipes included.
books.name: BLACKBERRY PIE MURDER
